data.message:
Hey Man, I know you try really hard to read all your fans messages, so I had a dream that maybe this year for New Year's Celebration, you might like to sing for the 90000 people of Fort McMurray, AB, Canada, that escaped the "Beast" and come out with a little cigar shop on the other end. I know there are many block parties and great times to be had in your neighborhood, but maybe you could save a gift of a little thump and pump Shady Style, for your crew in the Tar Sands, Alberta.

Peace Brother,
Al
